eeta amatharawa shri lankika yanthra suthra nishpadakayan 26, jathyanthara yanthrasuthra nishpadakayan 90, sancharaka kshethraye 80 k saha wasthu widyagnyayan 32 wenuwen pradarshana kuti wen kara thibena bawada ee mahatha pawasayi.wideshiya aayojakayan shri lankawata genwa ganima, wides sancharakayan genwa ganima menma shri lankiya apanayanakaruwanta wideshiya welendapola awastha nirmanayakara dima aramunu karagena pawathwena “riflekshan of shri lanka” welanda, sancharaka ha aayojana pradarshanaya aarthika sanwardhana, karmantha ha wanija katayuthu, parisara, mudal ha kramasampadana, aayojana prawardhana, pol sanwardhana, wawili karmantha, dhiwara athulu amathyanshaya kihipayak ekwa sanwidhanaya karayi.me athara lekamwaraya sadahan karanne podurajya mandaliya rajya nayaka samuluwa wenuwen sahabhagiwana rajya nayakayan, amathiwarun athulu wides rajyathanthrikayan wishala pirisak me pradarshanaya naradhimata sudanamin sitina bawath podurajya mandaliya wyaparika samuluwa wenuwen sahabhagiwana wides niyojithayan 700k pamana me awasthawata sambandhawana bawathya.eeta amatharawa lokaye ratawal 67 kata ayath aayojakayan, wyaparikayan athuluwa 2,500 th 3,000 th athara pirisak me pradarshanaya narambaanu athayi wishwasaya palakarana anura siriwardhana mahatha baththaramulla parlimenthu sankirnaya aasannaye pawathwena mema pradarshanaya labana 17 da thek pawathwena bawada kiyayi.ee anuwa me sandaha indiyawa, chinaya, kanadawa, eksath arabi emir rajya, eksath rajadhaniya, iranaya, pilipinaya, eejipthuwa, pakisthanaya, singappuruwa, dakunu aprikawa, si shels rajyaya athulu ratawal rasak sahabhagi wethi..

ithihasaya wisin wathman parapura matha pawara athi aithihasika wagakima bhara gannata ma samanga ekwana men oba siyalu denagenma ma illa sitinawa."yayi kageth awadhanaya yomu karamin janadhipathiwaraya siya rajasana kathawa awasan kaleya. 1947 warshaye sita me dakwa panaswarayakata adhika awastha gananakadi parlimenthuwa warawasana kara thibe. 1978 wasarin pasuwa pamanak parlimenthu sasiwara 25 k pamana pawathwa thibe.
